trans-unit.source: 当前已退出，请重新登录
trans-unit.target: 你已经退出了，请再次登录

trans-unit.source: 保存时出错，你当前已退出.
trans-unit.target: 写数据发生错误，你已经退出了.

trans-unit.source: 未找到指定论坛，你不具备访问权限，或者你还未登录.
trans-unit.target: 没有发现指定的论坛，或你没有权限，可能需要登录才能察看.
所有的消息已标记为已读.

trans-unit.source: 论坛所有的帖子你都已经阅读
trans-unit.target: 你已经阅读了论坛所有的帖子

trans-unit.source: 有多个回复的主题 (未阅读)

trans-unit.target: 主题已经移动到其它板块

trans-unit.source: 选定的主题未找到，可能是你没有访问的权限，或者需要登录才能查看.
trans-unit.target: 选择的主题未发现，或你没有权限，需要登录才能查看主题

trans-unit.source: 你没有修改状态的权限
trans-unit.target: 你没有权限更改处理状态

trans-unit.source: 只有管理员能回答这个问题
trans-unit.target: 仅仅管理员可以回复此帖

trans-unit.source: This topic is not a favorite
Report this post to the moderators
你没有发表新主题的权限.
trans-unit.target: 你未被允许打开新帖子，可能是没有访问权限

trans-unit.source: 发表新主题前，请先登录.
trans-unit.target: 未了创建新帖子，请先登录
我想收到帖子回复的通知

trans-unit.source: For security reasons you can commit a new post only every ###SPAMBLOCK### seconds.
trans-unit.target: 因为安全原因，你每###SPAMBLOCK###秒只能发一个帖子

trans-unit.source: A error occured while quoting the post. It is possible that you do not have the necessary rights
trans-unit.target: 引用帖子发送错误，可能是因为你没有权限

trans-unit.source:
It is possible that you do not have the necessary authorization or you did not log in.
Please log in first to create a new topic.
trans-unit.target:
你没有权限或没有登录.
，请先登录，再创建新帖子

trans-unit.source: Code examples, which you would like to post in the forum, should be entered in the regarding containers.
trans-unit.target: 你想发布的代码应嵌入相对应的容器
你真的想删除这个帖子？
[文章已经被编辑 ###COUNT###次， 最后一次在 ###DATE### at ###TIME###.]
你的邮件已经成功发送到###RECIPIENT###
请先登录再发送电子邮件

trans-unit.source: You must be logged in in order to view your post history.
trans-unit.target: 你必须登录才能查看发帖历史

trans-unit.source: The topic was added to your favorites.
trans-unit.target: 这个主题已经添加到收藏夹

trans-unit.source: The topic was deleted from your favorites.
trans-unit.target: 这个主题已经从收藏夹删除

trans-unit.source: You need to be logged in in order to see your favorite list.
trans-unit.target: 你必须登录才能查看你的收藏列表

trans-unit.source: You are about to edit several data records at one time. Do you really want to continue?
trans-unit.target: 你正在同时编辑多个记录，你真的要继续吗？

trans-unit.source: Please input a reason for reporting this post.
trans-unit.target: 请输入报告此帖子的原因

trans-unit.source: You must be logged in if you want to use this function.
trans-unit.target: 您必须登录才能使用这个功能

trans-unit.source: Please input a reason for reporting this post.
trans-unit.target: 请输入报告此帖的原因

trans-unit.source: Upload of file attachments is disabled.
不允许上传这种类型文件.
This file attachment does not exist.

trans-unit.target: 你真的想删除这个回复？

trans-unit.source: You have not the authorization to create a poll.
You have to specify a question in order to create a poll.
trans-unit.target: 创建投票前你必须指定一个问题

trans-unit.source: You have to specify at least %s answering possibilities.
trans-unit.target: 你必须制定至少%s回复的选项

trans-unit.source: Your email subscription list is empty.
trans-unit.target: 你的邮件订阅列表时空的

trans-unit.source: There are no posts to be published.
Your post was successfully created. It will be published by a moderator shortly.
trans-unit.target: 您的帖子已经成功创建，将版主审核发布

trans-unit.source: This topic has not been solved.
Edit the access control lists for this forum
trans-unit.target: 编辑这个论坛的访问控制列表

trans-unit.source: The forum %s has successfully been saved.
trans-unit.target: 论坛 %s 已经成功保存

trans-unit.source: The forum %s has successfully been deleted.
trans-unit.target: 论坛 %s 已经成功删除

trans-unit.source: The specified forum does not exist.
Please specify a description for this forum.
trans-unit.target: 请未这个论坛指定一个描述

trans-unit.source: The forum description needs to be at least %d characters long.
trans-unit.target: 论坛描述至少要包含%d个字符

trans-unit.source: The forum description must not be longer then %d characters.
trans-unit.target: 论坛描述不能多于%d个字符

trans-unit.source: Please specify a name for this forum.
The forum name needs to be at least %d characters long.
trans-unit.target: 论坛名字必须至少包含 %d个字符

trans-unit.source: The forum name must not be longer then %d characters.
trans-unit.target: 论坛名字必须不能长于 %d个字符

trans-unit.source: This forum has %d subforums. It cannot be made subforum of another forum.
trans-unit.target: 论坛有 %d子论坛，不能成为其它论坛的子论坛

trans-unit.source: You do not have access to this functionality.
trans-unit.target: 你没有权限访问这个功能
